# RCSMessage

**Structure**

A structure that contains an RCS message’s content and metadata.

## Declaration

```swift
struct RCSMessage
```

## Overview

When handling received messages, use the [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSMessage/content-swift.property] property to distinguish between different types of messages, such as [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSMessage/Text] or [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSMessage/DispositionNotification].

## Accessing message content

- **content**: The content of the message.
- **RCSMessage.Content**: An enumeration of the RCS message content types supported by the system.

## Working with content types

- **RCSMessage.Text**: A structure that represents text content in an RCS message.
- **RCSMessage.FileTransfer**: A structure that represents file transfer content in an RCS message.
- **RCSMessage.GeolocationPush**: A structure that represents geolocation push content in an RCS message.
- **RCSMessage.DispositionNotification**: A structure that represents disposition notification content in an RCS message, such as whether delivery succeeded or failed.
- **RCSMessage.Disposition**: An enumeration that represents the disposition of an RCS message, such as whether delivery succeeded or failed.
- **RCSMessage.ComposingIndicator**: A structure that represents RFC 3994 composing indicator content in an RCS message.

## Accessing message properties

- **cellularServiceID**: The cellular service identifier associated with the message.
- **CellularServiceID**: An opaque identifier that represents the cellular service for which to provide operations.
- **handle**: The handle associated with the sender or receiver of the message.
- **RCSHandle**: An enumeration that represents an RCS destination or sender.
- **id**: A message identifier for the message.
- **RCSMessageID**: A structure that represents an RCS message identifier.

## Receiving messages

- **incomingMessageNotifications**: An asynchronous sequence of incoming message notifications produced by this service.
- **RCSService.IncomingMessageNotification**: A structure that contains information about an incoming RCS message.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Identifiable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
